00009 #define DEMO_TRIAL_DAYS_FOR_PIRATES 1
00010 // Deleting preferences will delete the KEY_PIRATE_EXPIRATION_DATE which will
00011 // allow the pirate demo period to restart.  So, I set this to only 1 day.
00012 // I figure that most pirates are pretty impulsive.  They might buy tomorrow,
00013 // or else get tired of deleting their preferences every day.
00014
